title: Hour 1: Colin Hanks of The Neighbor Next Door Show
description:
Everyone in the Shipping Container is here for a staunch defense of Chris Cote, Tony is "triggered," and we are constantly confusing the Patriots and Buccaneers. Then, Colin Hanks joins us to promote his new Willie Mays documentary on HBO, "Say Hey, Willie Mays!" He discusses his love of documentaries, becoming the most well-rounded actor possible, the day the world found out his parents had COVID, what makes his dad as embarrassing as any other, and a whole lot more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
